name: Head to Hero
description:
Engage in 2D combat against your friend, in a fast paced, sports-like game. 

Player 1 wins by getting a score of 5 -- which is achieved by scoring white balls. Player 2 wins by getting a score of -5 -- which is achieved by scoring red balls. There are some surprises to 'help' the players achieve their goal.

Controls:

Player 1:  AD to move + Spacebar to jump

Player 2: 🡠 🡢 to move + 0 (zero) to jump 

PS: The 'Controls' tab in the game doesn't work
